mapper.insert: INSERT INTO supplier( id, supplier_no, company_name, company_addr, principal_name, principal_phone, create_date, remark, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{supplierNo}, #{companyName}, #{companyAddr}, #{principalName}, #{principalPhone}, #{createDate}, #{remark}, #{delFlag} )
